title: Why is OCE filled with so many South-East asians that ruin solo-queue games in Platinum/Diamond?
body: These players purposely troll, flame ALL game, and yet riot don't do anything about it because they're flaming in another language. It's really frustrating. I just wish that their ban system was regulated to other languages as well (and if they are, at least BETTER) so that the toxic asian community within OCE didn't exist. It's a serious issue that riot really need to look into.

replies.body:
But they might not be Asian, did you ever consider that?

Essentially the response you'll get on here man, nothing will be done, status quo will be protected.
So you're telling me that i'm not considering the fact that people people fluently speaking in some asian language that translates perfectly to flame? Don't you think that is ridiculous?

Yes i do, but we just get told the same stuff on here, and have for years.

Also i'm nearly certain that OCE banning system doesn't have other languages properly programmed in or taken from china etc. to ban in a similar state.

But hey it's not like it's obvious why this happens, but people would rather be blind, and i bet if i said what the actual issue is, i'd get shit on by the normal boards population.

I've actually been able to have a chat with a few people who troll like this;

----
Firstly, most of them aren't actually asian or at least don't speak the language but they are trolls

Secondly, they switch to this method of insulting other players due to it's effectiveness at arousing a response

Thirdly, they know Riot will not punish them, because Riot doesn't want to appear racist, it lets them incite other players with impunity.

Finally, they often actually additionally report you for racism, which puts you at a high risk of being banned, so be aware.
----
That's ridiculous, riot don't want to ban people because they might come off as "racist" yet these people are calling me "australian pig"? I don't know, pretty ridiculous system if you ask me.
although you can not stop them from trolling, but u can mute them. Or maybe you also wanted to have a 'firendly' conversation about race.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
